item.description:
There should be canvassing going on around the state every weekend. Check your local meetup group if it exists, or e-mail your county's official field organizer to see how you can help. We need to hit this as hard as possible in order to make sure we knock on every door possible.

Mike Faiella: Field Organizer (Homeschoolers and Churches)
mfaiella@ronpaul2008.com
724-0320

Andy Demers: Field Organizer (Hillsborough and Merrimack)
aedemers@ronpaul2008.com
703-1633

Josh Baker: Field Organizer (Cheshire and Sullivan)
Joshua.baker@ronpaul2008.com
545-4351

Derek Birch: Field Organizer (Grafton, Coos and Carroll)
dbirch@ronpaul2008.com
208-9359

Brinck Slattery: Field Organizer (Belknap, Strafford and Rockingham)
brinck@ronpaul2008.com
203-858-6315
item.name: Canvassing Around the State
